DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate efficacy acceptability Chinese language version MoodGYM therapeutic intervention treat symptom depression community dwell Chinese Americans Boston area . Hypothesis 1 : Participants enrol MoodGYM show significant decrease depressive symptom completion 5 module . Hypothesis 2 : Participants enrol MoodGYM show significantly improve dysfunctional thinking . Hypothesis 3 : Participants enrol MoodGym rate program culturally acceptable .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Acceptability MoodGYM Treating Depressive Symptoms Chinese Americans
DOC.criteria: Resident US , selfidentified Chinese origin At least 18 year age Proficiency Chinese , include ability read Chinese Access computer internet Scores > 10 Chinese bilingual patient health questionnaire 9 item ( PHQ9 ) Current ongoing psychiatric psychological treatment Using illicit drug consumption > 3 standard drink day Currently experience psychotic illness Past current history schizophrenia bipolar disorder ECT last year Current active suicidal selfinjurious potential necessitating immediate facetoface treatment
